segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve practiced this or if it’s their first time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, and she has no idea what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how bold they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hand is out, and she’s just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is a mix of cute and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen if the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR
